title: Amazon pulls AI anime dubs after fan backlash
description: Amazon pulled its AI-made English and Latin American Spanish anime dubs after fan backlash

title: AI start-ups in the UK need more than money
description: In Silicon Valley, VCs offer both funding and advice from partners who built their own global businesses

title: Calgary-area teen accused of using AI to create child sex abuse material - Global News

title: Calgary-area teen accused of using AI to create child sex abuse material
description: A 17-year-old teen is facing charges after being accused of using artificial intelligence to create child pornographic material involving several girls from Calgary-area schools.

title: 1,000+ Amazon Employees Sign Open Letter Warning of AI Dangers
description: More than 1,000 Amazon employees have reportedly signed an open letter addressed to CEO Andy Jassy and the company's senior leadership team, expressing grave concerns about the tech giant's aggressive rollout of AI and its potential consequences.The post 1,000+ Amazon Employees Sign Open Letter Warning of AI Dangers appeared first on Breitbart.
